w:r.w:t: on. Prepayment of entire course entitles you to one free lesson; see below for # of weeks. Semester registration fee is $5.00, non-refundable. Class times listed are for first night only.

Specific class times will be assigned on registration night/day, split according to ability, age or rank for the remainder of the semester. Regular classes are 40 minutes long. Class times not known prior to registration night/day.

Uniforms are available (not required) for $28.00 (tax included). Testing is available for rank promotions (not required) at the end of each semester for $10.00 (not including class fee).

w:r.w:t: Soccer ball ($12.00) and shin pads ($10.00/pair) are required by the 2nd week and are available or you may bring your own. Rubber cleats recommended. No metal cleats.

All Stars class fee is $6.00 for a 60 minute lesson. Metallic siver and red pom-poms will be available for $12.00 (tax included) or you may bring your own. Tryout for pom levels is available (not required) at the end of each semester for $10.00 (not including class fee).

w:r.w:t: Knee pads are available for $12.00. Tryouts for wrist-band levels are available (not required) at the end of the semester for $10.00 (not including class fee). Students should wear tennis shoes to class.
Parents & friends are welcome to watch the first lesson!
Registration forms are available first night.
e accepted up to the third week •
Cash, Money Orders or Checks only (drivers license required)
No Credit or Debit Cards accepted.
Call Young Champions at 480-603-3780 for class times after 1st class & any questions.
